name: Journey to Ghoulcrest
description: Journey to Ghoulcrest is a turn based board game inspired rpg. The player is a mear mercenary sent by the kings to retrive a certain artifact by the name of Sunbloom. The player receives various cards to help his journey and may also be hit by various debuffs which can hinder his journey to his destination. Check the game out for more lore and the game is currently still under-development. So please do check it out and let me know of the bugs, changes, Extra-content. Newer gameplay elements are being added and tested to mix the elements of rpg combat and story narration into the game.
